Description.val: Family of Weapons Sights (FWS) consist of Individual (I), Crew-Served (CS), Sniper (S) variants, and the Thermal Weapon Sight (TWS).  The AAO for the TWS was completed with the FY12 procurement.  The FWS variant family will increase lethality and improve situational awareness, by extending the range a Warfighter can recognize potential targets.  The FWS-I (Milestone C is FY15) reduces target engagement time in both day and night conditions through Rapid Target Acquisition (RTA).  The FWS-CS (Milestone C is FY18) will enable a crew served weapon gunner to more accurately engage targets in less time by utilizing a Head Mounted Display and disturbed reticle that adjusts the aim point.  The FWS-S (Milestone C is FY18) will provide greater detection, recognition and aiding in identification at greater ranges during periods of darkness and limited visibility.

Justification.val: FY 2015 Base procurement dollars, in the amount of $49.205 million, procures 1,661 FWS-I systems for Production Qualification Testing (PQT) and Low Rate Initial Production (LRIP).
